website_summaries.verdict: Throw pillow sham with a silky sheen and a great range of color choices.
pros: Looks like real silk, although texture is rougher than silk
Richly colored fabric with a subtle, pretty sheen
Comes in 6 sizes and a variety of colors
cons: This price is for a single sham
May wish to choose the next size up for overstuffed pillows

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not soft.
customer_reviews.text: I like these because they look nice but I am not a fan of how they feel. No we do not sleep on these, instead we use them to lean up against while reading in bed and for decorative purposes. I bought the aqua and they are really cute and shimmery. I do recommend getting a pillow 1-2" bigger to fill it. My pillows fit perfect in these beauties. These are good quality quality pillowcases. I may get other colors in the future.
customer_reviews.author: RayJoni07

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought four of these larger pillow covers (24x24) in the color Brass or Antique, and two smaller ones (18x18) in the color Sand, to mix in with some striped pillow covers I also bought on Amazon. I purchased these to cover up the original pillows on my sectional, which were getting threadbare and dingy. They look quite nice mixed together, and seem to be of a nice quality fabric. Hoping that they will wear well. Shipping was amazingly fast, I would definitely do business with this seller again. I am submitting pictures of these covers. Now if I could just find cushion seat covers!
customer_reviews.author: MntMom

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: After several washihg etc i was just about ready to donate my OLD BEIGE Euro Shams to the good will, when i came across this great item. Coverups or Euro sham pillow cases. its difficult to find 25 x 25 coverups but these fit the bill. As soon as i got them i got my old shams out, threw on the zip up pink cover up and BAM a new pillow on my bed! absolutely gorgeous!
customer_reviews.author: val nevarez

customer_reviews.title: Well Made. Nice Material
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't the perfect brown that I was looking for but it works. I would say that if your insert is not overly plush you might want to size down. I bought a 26x26 and had a 26x26 insert and it doesn't fill it totally out. Well made. Has a zipper which I like. Yes you do have to spend a little extra time stuffing the insert in because of the size of the zipper but that was no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Henning

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 26x26 euro shams not realizing that they were sold as a single item not a pair. The one came and I went back into my account and ordered it again. The new one arrive with different fabric and the zippered hole to insert the pillow was too small. I had to force the pillow into the pillow case and it ended up ripping. Now I have two shams that look different. Not happy! I can't return them because the return fee is more than what I paid for the item. Smh. I'm disappointed Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: These throw covers are absolutely gorgeous. They look just like silk. The zipper is located on the long side, making it so easy to insert the pillow. Two things I should mention: the color green is a bit more yellow than shown in the picture, and the cover is a bit generous in its fit. It fits the standard 12 x 18 pillow but is a bit loose. So if you like your pillows stuffed you will have to add padding around the pillow. Since I am using these as a declaration on my couch, I really don't mind the loose fit. I also purchased them in the pale orange shade and they are just as gorgeous.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh A. Delany

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous  Colors, Quality, and Value
customer_reviews.text: I really like these pillow covers. The fabric, quality of workmanship, and colors are great. I got blue and taupe. The blue is a subtle slate blue and the taupe is sandy. They match perfectly with my master bedroom decor. I do not recommend going up a filler size for this material. I would definitely recommend these pillow covers. I have purchased three sizes including the euro sham and they are all top drawer.
customer_reviews.author: PJStewart

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I am rather impressed with the quality. The material is beautiful and the zipper is even very nice...the color matches. I am glad i made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: mthgk

customer_reviews.title: Love everything about these!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a gray comforter set that included only two shams. I had just purchased these Euro pillows for my spare set and figured if I can just find some grayish Euro shams I can use these pillows for both sets. It’s a silvery gray on the darker side of the gray spectrum. They seem very sturdy and durable and for the price they can’t be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: These are a fine quality and a nice color and texture I would ...
customer_reviews.text: Looked all over for dusty rose pillowcases that didn't cost a fortune and these fit the bill. They definitely are dusty rose which is the hottest color on Pinterest right now... keep your eye out this will be the color of the year for 2017 I think. These are a fine quality and a nice color and texture I would say you get a lot of bang for your buck and these are a deal.
customer_reviews.author: AmKrisKen

customer_reviews.title: Zipper Breaks & Fabric Pilling
customer_reviews.text: Yes, these look nice when they arrive. If you use them with any kind of regularity, the fabric begins to pill up and the zipper breaks completely. I've ordered this twice, thinking after the first time, that it was just a one-off issue. But the second order has been exactly the same. Cheap, yes. Cheaply made, absolutely yes.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Titus

customer_reviews.title: Perfect color
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying to find something to cover my 26x26 inserts with that matched my bedding. These are a perfect silver/pewter color. They are good quality. If i ever needed a different color or more inserts, would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Zippers are way too small!
customer_reviews.text: The fabric on the covers is okay -- the best you can expect for the price. However, on the covers I received they "cheaped" out on the zippers. They were substantially smaller than the actual size of the pillow so I had to literally stuff the pillow inside. The zipper did not break but I think I just lucked out. Be aware, especially if you are purchasing covers for a larger sized pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Therese

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied for my intended use.
customer_reviews.text: Satisfied. The appearance gives off a clean sheen and projects that the pillow covers are worth maybe double. My Duvet cover and sheets and pillows that I use are pricey and very good quality, mainly because I actually use them. I bought these Euro Shams for a inexpensive alternative to not paying close to 200 bucks for my matching set. So, works good for my intended use, decoration against the headboard, and maybe some extra fluff to keep a lady friend supported. The feel is rough, not smooth at all, so just keep it as a bottom layer.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Ripped
customer_reviews.text: Came with a huge hole across the top. Also, not the products fault, but there is only one cover and I totally thought there were two. I was a really disappointed to open one, singular ripped product when I expected two whole ones. :(
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Pretty But the Wrong Color
customer_reviews.text: This cover is pretty and well made, but the color wasn't anywhere near what was pictured on my computer. This teal was more of a steel blue so I sent it back and ordered from another company. (The pillow form manufacturer recommend a form 2 inches smaller all the way around than the size of the cover, and they were right!)
customer_reviews.author: My Experience

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Well made pillow covers. The fabric feels a little rough compared to the more silky texture I’m used to and the color is slightly darker than the picture. Overall, I’m happy with my purchase and extra happy to find things that are not made in China for a change. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: lic

customer_reviews.title: I liked these shams
customer_reviews.text: I liked these shams. I've bought two matching ivory colored shams for my decorative pillows so far. They wash well and have not worn out after about 3 washes. I will likely buy more in other colors in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well
customer_reviews.text: Nice color and well made. I have purchased other pillow covers from this company and am always satisfied with quality. Came quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Janet L Jones

customer_reviews.title: CREATIVE SOLID DECORATIVE PILLOW COVER
customer_reviews.text: I give this product four stars due to the fact of fitting. These pillow covers (purple) work great with my purple, grey and white rug for my living room and grey sofa/love set. The material is sturdy and doesn't look cheap. The zipper is hidden well, you'd never know they were covers. I ordered 22" by 22" which were the measurements of my pillows. However, they fit a little too tightly over my pillows, these pillow covers, took off about an inch from each pillow. It doesn't look bad, I assume after a while they will stretch out to the correct length.
customer_reviews.author: For The Art In You, LLC

customer_reviews.title: Well made, but Scratchy
customer_reviews.text: I ended up returning these. I guess it depends on what you want it for. The color was beautiful. The quality was well made. But the material was not soft. Kind of scratchy. That made it a no-go for its intended use. If you just need a cover for show only, not touchy feely comfort, then it is a great cover.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy with these euro shams. The color is exactly as shown in the picture and the fabric is beautiful. I love these so much I ordered some in a different color for my daughter and she is delighted. I would recommend these to any of my friends looking to add a little elegance to their bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: jaynee odom

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful looking sham!
customer_reviews.text: Runs a little large, ended up putting a larger pillow inside. The shams look very expensive and the color is bold. They have a little texture and sheen to them as well. Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: D.H.

customer_reviews.title: Stitching around the zippers is nicely done so there are no loose ends or threads
customer_reviews.text: Color is as expected for the navy blue. Fabric has the shantung look without the big slubs. Stitching around the zippers is nicely done so there are no loose ends or threads. The case fits loosely making it easy to get the pillow in.
customer_reviews.author: Seza L.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I bought the charcoal. It has alot of silver in it which was perfect for me. The cover is very well made. The inside seams are bound and the zipper really is concealed. The only thing that would make it even better would be if the inside were lined, but for this price this cover is REALLY nice and I'm thinking of ordering a couple more! Very good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Becky F.

customer_reviews.title: Simply elegant!
customer_reviews.text: The only downside with this product is that I didn’t realize it comes in packs of one. So I am waiting for the second to arrive. Don’t forget to order two. Looks lovely!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah L Kirkham

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great on white bedding. I recommend this it’s affordable and worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous shams!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shams and they look very expensive! It was the exact color I was looking for. I love the hidden zipper and they look like real silk! These look very high end.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great material
customer_reviews.text: Perfect euro shams for my quilt set that didn’t have matching ones. Aqua/turquoise color matched great and the material felt very nice. Not sure how long they’ll last, but they look great now and the price was very reasonable. Nice zipper closure.
customer_reviews.author: DecorQueen173

customer_reviews.title: I would definitely recommend and purchase again
customer_reviews.text: I would definitely recommend and purchase again. They are an unusual color gray, which works with the strange colored "Going Out of Business" sale at K-Mart. (s/n: The lump on left is my child)
customer_reviews.author: WDC

customer_reviews.title: Just what we were looking for
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in my daughters room. Used asaccent pillows with blush -colored bedding
customer_reviews.author: Emanderson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect match
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect match to my comforter set! Will likely order additional colors.
customer_reviews.author: Leet105

customer_reviews.title: Love these covers!
customer_reviews.text: These pillow covers are PERFECT! I was able to replace the covers on 3 down pillows that had word out with these. They look great and the colors are the same, so no need to change my decor. Of course, should you want to change your decor, here's a great way to do it at a reasonable price. They look just like the silk ones they replace, but should be more durable and washable (I assume, though I would do it by hand in Woolite). Very pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Louise E. Larson

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Hoped For
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for! Beautiful addition to our bedding decor. Has some trepidation about washing them but they launder beautifully (washer and dryer).
customer_reviews.author: Jw23

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous color and fabric
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is so shiney And looks expensive. Zippers have held up so far. Size is accurate also.
customer_reviews.author: SStone

customer_reviews.title: Easy, simple, fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and textures of these throw covers. Makes it easy to change them out if you want to change color schemes and textures without having to buy all new pillows.
customer_reviews.author: Candice from Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: These worked so nicely for the price I plan on buying more in ...
customer_reviews.text: These worked so nicely for the price I plan on buying more in other colors. At this price I can change up the look of my bedding more frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Darthmadonna

customer_reviews.title: looks like raw silk
customer_reviews.text: color is right on and zipper is done correctly. looks good. It is polyester so I expect it will "pil" eventually.
customer_reviews.author: crage

customer_reviews.title: Has zipper and pretty look, color
customer_reviews.text: Nice soft feel and look to fabric and color. Fits well and zipper allows for washing if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Jadwiga

customer_reviews.title: Itchy material....
customer_reviews.text: Ok so this is a hard one because I love the look and it seems to be of lasting quality....even after washing the color and look was perfect. The con is that the fabric is very itchy and not soft enough to lay on.
customer_reviews.author: Miz Nav

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful pillow covers - love color
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful pillow covers. I purchased them In "Eggplant" and they are true to the color shown on my monitor. Very nice zipper sewn in and nicely finished. Wash in cold water. Good purchase
customer_reviews.author: Bosan44

customer_reviews.title: Solid product
customer_reviews.text: It was more yellow than I expected but overall the quality is very durable and I love that it zips!
customer_reviews.author: Justin Reed

customer_reviews.title: HIGH QUALITY INDEED !
customer_reviews.text: I am more than pleased with these pillow covers in quality, color, and material. I use of them is for back pillows against my headboard and not to sleep on. I chose the 22" x 22" and they look like silk costing so much more. The delivery was lightning fast. I will be decorating my second bedroom and shall return to buy another set in a different shade. Highly recommended indeed!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara A. Cyprus

customer_reviews.title: Such a pretty addition to my bed set
customer_reviews.text: Goes well with my purple/lavender king sized bed set. The king size comforter set came with only two Euro Shams and I needed another one to fill up the space in the last row (closest to the head board). I was not able to find the exact match but this one complimented the other two shams and they all look so pretty together. As for the material it seems top notch. The zipper is hidden which makes it look even prettier.
customer_reviews.author: Sujesh

customer_reviews.title: These shams are exactly what I was looking for. ...
customer_reviews.text: These shams are exactly what I was looking for. I may have ordered them too big, so be sure you know your exact measurements. I ordered in silver, which actually turns out to be pewter. This worked out for me as pewter is the color I was actually wanting.
customer_reviews.author: Kay B.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Charcoal Color
customer_reviews.text: This pillow was the perfect shade for my living room. Unfortunately, the reviews said it was softer verses silkier so that is why I bought it. The cover was to be used for a cat pillow. However, it was very silky (not soft like cotton) and obviously would get thread runs from the cat hopping on and off of it. So, I returned it. The company promptly credited my credit card.
customer_reviews.author: HJPeters

customer_reviews.title: Nice, inexpensive pillow cases
customer_reviews.text: I got two of these in the black color to go with our new bedding. They are for decorative pillows that we don't actively use, so I don't know how they sleep, but they are great for decorative use. They look very nice and hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa C.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to maintain
customer_reviews.text: Very sleek but I can just pop them in the washer when the kids get them dirty
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Accent Pillow
customer_reviews.text: High quality, very happy with the fabric and invisible zipper. Have not had to clean it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Magnolia

customer_reviews.title: It's definitely pretty to look at
customer_reviews.text: It's definitely pretty to look at, but as others have noted (and I failed to see before I bought), the fabric is very scratchy and not at all soft or smooth. Not comfortable to lie on. Also, it is a little roomy for a 26x26 Euro pillow, about an inch too long each way.
customer_reviews.author: cnewm

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: It has a silk like look for an inexpensive price. Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ecall23

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase. The material was thicker than I expected. I recommend getting a size up for your fill pillow. I bought a 28/28 pillow for a 26/26 case and it looks amazing. The material is not silky is that’s what you’re looking for, it has texture to it. Reminds me of brushed metal. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarina koury

customer_reviews.title: Great value!!
customer_reviews.text: These shams are beautiful! For the price, you cannot beat them. I ordered the blush pink color and they look great. I'll try to upload pics but the Amazon app is being finicky at the moment.
customer_reviews.author: Jessa A.

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with these shames.
customer_reviews.text: Great shames and the colors are spot on to the display pictures. I have machine washed mine several times. Very good material and quality of design. Only wished I did not have to buy the pillow inserts. Great and easy way to add color to a room.
customer_reviews.author: L Baker

customer_reviews.title: My absolute favorite product!
customer_reviews.text: My absolute favorite product!!! The colors are as stated.The stitch is perfect to hide the seam and zipper. Looks great on my bed. Please Please consider making covers for bolster pillows. Please :-)
customer_reviews.author: Brena Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Nice buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these for new cushions I purchased for my ugly old couch. Beautifully colored, fit perfectly. The material is slightly rough but that's due to the texturing of the material. I like them so much I bought two more.
customer_reviews.author: Janea B.

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Covers for Throw Pillow. Looks Like Silk.
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous, solid green cover for throw pillows. I was surprised how rich looking the fabric is. They run a little small. But it fit, and now complements our blue pillows. Love it. I would buy more in a heartbeat!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn M.

customer_reviews.title: Very rough material
customer_reviews.text: Fits just as described, but the fabric is almost as rough as sisal. It's great if you use it on a decorative or a through pillow, but far to rough to use to sleep on.
customer_reviews.author: Deijos

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! Look exactly as I'd hoped. Gorgeous in person! Well made! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Audi

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but poor color authenticity
customer_reviews.text: The Navy is almost black, it was very difficult to determine if it was black or blue.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriella Mason

customer_reviews.title: Nice color but a bit scratchy.
customer_reviews.text: The color was as pictured, but the fabric is scratchy and unpleasant to touch. For a pillow I have on my bed and plan to sleep with, it just wouldn't do.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Wright

customer_reviews.title: Great color and quality.
customer_reviews.text: Three 26x26 pillows were the perfect texture, color and size for my king size bed. Vibrant orange color with slight sheen. Zipper well made and hidden, easy to get in insert. Made inserts myself so the pillows stood up and were full. Good for decorative use but would be scratchy to lay on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect deep red that matches a furniture piece I wanted ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly, perfect deep red that matches a furniture piece I wanted it to match. Thin, however, was glad for that, not as bulky which is also what I was looking for. Arrived sooner than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: They are really nice actually and even though they don't match the rust ...
customer_reviews.text: These shams have a little bit of Gold sheen to them. They are really nice actually and even though they don't match the rust color in my comforter, it gives another dimension to the oranges, peaches and etc in the room. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Eller

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought the Silver and it's beautiful. This is a true silver and not a grey looking very nice
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: I ordered four 12x18" lumbar cases and they look even better in person
customer_reviews.text: These pillow covers are gorgeous! I ordered four 12x18" lumbar cases and they look even better in person. I ordered red and when they arrived they are more of a dark red color which is what I prefer. I ordered them because I'm converting my living room to fall colors and they work great. I am definitely going to order from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Works well, looks nice.
customer_reviews.text: Nice dense (aqua) fabric, matching zipper. Larger pillow fills it well. I give it four stars because the seams are raw on the inside of the sham.
customer_reviews.author: GiGi

customer_reviews.title: Great Euro Pillow Covers
customer_reviews.text: These pillow covers are great for the money,the people complaining about these being a little rough can go spend $70 bucks on real raw silk,i found them to be well made,loved the hidden zipper,i bought them in hot pink,my bedroom has been transformed.
customer_reviews.author: The Goddess

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied decorator
customer_reviews.text: This sham color has held up well after ONE year. I'd forgotten the material was FAUX silk until I reordered another color this week. The covers are elegant, well made, and feel like and look like raw silk. VERY good price for TWO well made sham covers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the European shams for my nursery/guest room daybed. The fit was perfect and the quality is excellent. Delivered on time. Would definitely order these again!
customer_reviews.author: BCL37072

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Received these today and was very surprised how lovely they are. The color is spot on as it appears on the website. The material looks expensive and fit my 26x26 pillows perfectly. Love the zipper closure. I would recommend shams
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Sleek design and quality fabric and zipper
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Sleek design and quality fabric and zipper. I change out my comforter, pillows and bed skirt with the seasons, so I'm thrilled that these come in a variety of colors. I'll be purchasing more of these.
customer_reviews.author: serendipity

customer_reviews.title: While the covers are nicely done with zippers and the material is just ok ...
customer_reviews.text: Keep in mind, these do not come as pictured. These are only pillow covers, no stuffing inside or pillow foam. While the covers are nicely done with zippers and the material is just ok kind of rough not satin or soft to touch . You need to know.
customer_reviews.author: Toni S Wolz

customer_reviews.title: because the color was perfect and with that little bit of shine to them ...
customer_reviews.text: I was really nervous on the color as it looked a little bit lighter than I was needing, and then the dims were 26x26 but my pillow inserts are 27x27. However, I was thrilled when I got them, because the color was perfect and with that little bit of shine to them from the silk, it finished off my bed perfectly! Also, my inserts fit in there no problem. These are absolutely worth the money and I was so excited because I had been shopping around for a long time and these euro shams are obscenely expensive anywhere else! So happy I found them!
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Matejek

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shams!
customer_reviews.text: These are so beautiful! Very true to color and the texture is very silk-like. I love them!!
customer_reviews.author: Cyndy

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color
customer_reviews.text: What i reveived was not gapple green as pictured it was the sage green instead waiting to hear back for replacement. Make sure to order a size down from pillow insert i didnt too much loose fabric
customer_reviews.author: Vickie

customer_reviews.title: Quality stitching and accurate color
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is a little scratchy and not too comfortable to rest your face on but they are decorative after all and not meant to sleep on. The color was as I expected based on the web site picture and the workmanship is sturdy. This is a good quality product.
customer_reviews.author: ChefG

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow for formal living room (or a bedroom)
customer_reviews.text: This pillow cover was well made. I think the fabric is best suited for a formal living room or a bedroom. The color didn't match as well as I thought it would, but that was my fault. I would order again.
customer_reviews.author: MHS-SC

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: It was as described. I’m satisfied with the product thus far. The only complaint is that one of the shams had a faint mark on it
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Paige

customer_reviews.title: Not shiny
customer_reviews.text: It is not quite as shiny as it appeared and as I had hoped
customer_reviews.author: Pam L.

customer_reviews.title: Nice decorative fabric
customer_reviews.text: Nice decorative fabric. The navy is quite dark, which I was hoping for. I measured my pillows and thought it would fit perfectly but the case is a little larger than I had anticipated. Still looks nice. Not comfortable enough for sleeping on.
customer_reviews.author: Bruw

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured it seems- can't really use them
customer_reviews.text: These are definitely from a different dye lot than the ones I had purchased earlier because these have a more yellowish ivory tinge. Not as represented in the pic. at least not from my perspective.
customer_reviews.author: Gingergirl69

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, well-made, fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this sham! It's a Faux Silk and fits my 26" x 26" Euro Pillows perfectly! I haven't washed it yet so I don't know about that part, but the colors are quite true to the on-line presentation! I bought three of them and will buy more!
customer_reviews.author: Liz Severino

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the color, not received yet, but I know I will lobe it.
customer_reviews.author: Della Mercado

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Pillow cover was exactly as pictured. Nice quality, vivid color.
customer_reviews.author: KRISTIN

customer_reviews.title: just bought it
customer_reviews.text: nice pillow covering. it is exactly 18 x 18, not like other pillow covers
customer_reviews.author: Diane Williams

customer_reviews.title: and there's a beautiful sheen to it that looks great on my linen ...
customer_reviews.text: These are very attractive and look much more expensive than they are. They appear to be well constructed with a lot of care taken to conceal the zipper seam. I ordered the brown, and there's a beautiful sheen to it that looks great on my linen couch. I've tried and returned five other options from other sources before finally finding these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy and super cute and affordable!
customer_reviews.text: True to color and size and the hidden zipper is nice. Not too thick and you can see thru it. Overall satisfied with the cover, great purchase for my budget and decor for my new bedding project!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Lavalais

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these shams in Eggplant. They are a gorgeous deep purple and perfect for my bedding set. The quality of these shams is excellent-- I was somewhat surprised at the quality because of their price. Pleasant surprise! Great product for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: JKHale

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: This matches my new bedding perfectly. Took a little while longer to be shipped, but just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: LaShawna Smith

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great color and quality for the price. I recommend you try this. I usually get custom made throw pillows and bought this as a fill in for my guest bedroom and got far more than I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: marilynne

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous love it! I got 3 to put on back of the bed at the headboard.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Love these pillow cases. Purple is my favorite color and these added just the right pop to my brown couch!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole mastroddi

customer_reviews.title: Nice color
customer_reviews.text: I like the color but, fabric is not so soft but it is okay . Pillow cases are great .
customer_reviews.author: NAHID AKASHEH

customer_reviews.title: I love the Faux Silk Euro Shams
customer_reviews.text: I love the Faux Silk Euro Shams. They are of high quality construction, look great, and feel good when I am sleeping on them. My only complaint is that there were no washing instructions included with the shipment? Does anyone know how to wash these shams? Can they handle a high heat dryer?
customer_reviews.author: Dan Medynski

customer_reviews.title: Love that it zippers shut
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping. Material VERY scratchy. Love that it zippers shut.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy from Ky

customer_reviews.title: Who needs one?
customer_reviews.text: What a ridiculous mis-representation! There's only one in the package. Who needs one euro pillow sham? No one. What moronic packaging. Don't be fooled by the price...an effective quantity of these shams are twice what you think.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Butler

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Color is as pictured and up-cycled an old pillow in freshly painted room.
customer_reviews.author: PonchoLady

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Color was perfect as was the fit. They look great on my bed. Perfect decorative, accent pillow shams. Just ordered two more in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: careful shopper

customer_reviews.title: Awesome update for any bed ensemble.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shams. They are beautiful, high quality, and go with any decor. Please use to update any bed ensemble. Gorgeous to the touch.
customer_reviews.author: Bernadette O.

product_meta.title: Aiking Home Solid Faux Silk Euro Sham/Pillow Cover, Zipper Closure, 26 by 26 Inches, Eggplant
product_meta.description:
Size:26x26| Color:EggplantSolid faux silk fabric
Faux silk fabric is made from 100-percent polyester, which is a man-made product. This fabric also has a beautiful sheen and a nice weight, it can give any room an elegant look. Perfect for the decor of your home, office, car, and any special event, etc

Product Feature
100% Polyester, Reverses to self
Slub textile, lightweight, thin, durable and easy to care
Double stitching – Make your pillow luxury and keep your pillow stay in place
Hidden zipper closure - Easy to install and remove for laundering
Over 20 colored - Easy to match your decors

Package
( Pack of 1 ) *** pillow is NOT included ***

Care Instructions
Machine wash cold with like colors
Gently cycle only, No Bleach
Tumble dry low
Warm iron if needed

Note
All dimensions are measured manually with deviation ranged at 0.5 inches
The product color may slightly differ due to different monitors

Made in the USA and Imported by Aiking Home Collection
feature_bullets: Machine washable, Tumble dry low, Warm iron if needed
Package Contain: 1 Pillow Cover ( Pillow is NOT included )
